.. _slag-mpp-model-implementation:

Slag Physical Property Model Implementation
===========================================

The ``auxi-mpp`` models are divided into unary, binary and multicomponent classes.
This section will give general instruction on how to use them.

To run the material physical property package, ``auxi-mpp`` needs to be
installed.

In a terminal, run::

   pip install auxi-mpp

   :maxdepth: 2

   essentials
   unary-class
   binary-class
   multi-class
   physical-property/index
